duties_responsibilities.duty: Review clinical documentation and diagnostic results to extract data and apply appropriate ICD-10 and PCS Diagnosis codes.
Accurately code conditions and procedures in accordance with official coding guidelines.
Maintain a working knowledge of ICD-9-10 PCS and CPT coding principles, governmental regulations, and third-party requirements.
Assure that all services documented in the patient’s chart are coded with appropriate ICD-10/PCS codes.
Seek proper documentation when services/diagnoses are not documented appropriately.
Maintain high level of accuracy and productivity in coding.
Work with CDI and physician queries for accurate code assignments.
Apply knowledge of Government and other payer guidelines for compliant coding.

education_certification.credential: CCS, RHIT or RHIA Certification from AHIMA
